title: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Valentine, Soshite Onsen! - Amari Kitai Shinaide Kudasai
original_name: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン バレンタイン, そして温泉! (あまり期待しないでください)
opening_song: "Aozora no Rhapsody (青空のラプソディ)" by fhána
ending_song: "Ishukan Communication (イシュカン・コミュニケーション)" by Chorogonzu (ちょろゴンず) [Tooru (Yuuki Kuwahara), Kanna (Maria Naganawa), Elma (Yuuki Takada) & Lucoa (Minami Takahashi)]
sinopse: Unaired episode included with the 7th volume of the BD/DVD release of Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon.
